name: Office Basement v3
description:
The power is out, and the generator to the building is broken. You must find all the generator parts as well as the key to the generator room to repair the generator (currently using stone cube as placeholder model) and restore power. You are equipped with only a flashlight which has limited battery power so you must be quick. Your health degenerates as you spend time in the darkness. You must also be wary of the spooky effects of the basement. They are not good for your health. You can find candy to restore your health as well as batteries to extend the life of your flashlight. Press E to interact with doors and to repair the generator. Press F to toggle the flashlight. Press P to pause the game.

This version adds improves on the experience of v2 with more information on the HUD, new sound effects, and a couple new meshes.
